# Carcats
## Gameplay Features - Carcats are naturally equipped with sharp claws that deal increased melee damage. - Wearing shoes? Not for them. Where have you seen boots that would fit paws with claws? - Soft Paws - soft pads provide absolutely silent footsteps. - Night Vision - nature has gifted carcats with excellent night vision â€” they see in the dark almost as well as in daylight. - Cat-like Grace - carcats can jump from a height of 2 floors without taking any damage or being stunned.
